document.full_text: virgin group founder richard branson, known for such exploits as trying to balloon around the world, said on tuesday he planned to explore the deepest parts of the world's oceans with a jet-like submarine.
document.title: richard branson unveils deep-sea submarine plans
lines_and_colors: virgin group founder richard branson, known for such exploits as trying to balloon around the world, said on tuesday he planned to explore the deepest parts of the world's oceans with a jet-like submarine.
